property.name: Flavor

property.value: Creatures you control have vigilance. Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.

property.value: Enduring the most desolate and dangerous conditions, Abzan sentries unfailingly guard the stronghold gates.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Anafenza holds court under the First Tree, the gates of Mer-Ek are sealed. No safer place exists in all of Tarkir.

property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.value: Her palm flared like the eye of a waking dragon. Then all was calm.

property.value: When Mardu Blazebringer attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Make sure he's pointed in the right direction before you light him. And don't let the goblins anywhere near the torch." —Kerai Suddenblade, Mardu hordechief

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid — When Mardu Heart-Piercer enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, Mardu Heart-Piercer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who have never ridden before the wind do not know the true joy of war."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid — When Mardu Warshrieker enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, add {R}{W}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No body can contain so much fury. It reminds me of another battle, long past." —Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1: Until end of turn, Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker becomes a legendary 4/4 red Dragon creature with flying, indestructible, and haste. (He doesn't lose loyalty while he's not a planeswalker.) −3: Sarkhan, the Dragonspeaker deals 4 damage to target creature. −6: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards" and "At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ogre's mind snapped. The bow was next. The archer followed quickly after.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? They are as fierce as the bear that fears no foe and as sly as the mink that creeps unseen. You will be as much prey as they." —Nitula, the Hunt Caller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shintan sensed the malice in his opponent, but he did not strike until the orc's muscles tensed in preparation to throw the first punch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Tormenting Voice, discard a card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?" —Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you hear that, Sarkhan? The glory of the horde! I made a legend from what you abandoned." —Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Valley Dasher attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mardu riders' greatest fear is that a battle might end before their weapons draw blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid — War-Name Aspirant enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn. War-Name Aspirant can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No battle means more to a Mardu warrior than the one that earns her war name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Temur welcome bears into the clan, fighting alongside them in battle. The relationship dates back to when they labored side by side under Sultai rule.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every shaft is graven with a name from a kin tree, calling upon the spirits of the ancestors to make it fly true.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Temur warriors enter the battle trance known as "awakening the bear," they lose all sense of enemy or friend, seeing only threats to the wilderness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature and untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When we were lost and weary, the ainok showed us how to survive. They have earned the right to call themselves Abzan, and to wear the Scale." —Anafenza, khan of the Abzan

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 5 life. Ferocious — You gain 10 life instead if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Temur believe three things only are needed in life: a hot fire, a full belly, and a strong companion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be placed on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are placed on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Naga shed their scales. We wear ours with pride." —Golran, dragonscale captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Ferocious — Whenever Heir of the Wilds attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Heir of the Wilds gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the high caves of the Qal Sisma mountains, young hunters quest to hear the echoes of their fierce ancestors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Highland Game dies, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bring down a stag and fix its horns upon her head. This one hears the whispers." —Chianul, at the weaving of Arel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hooded Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Hooded Hydra dies, put a 1/1 green Snake creature token onto the battlefield for each +1/+1 counter on it. Morph {3}{G}{G} As Hooded Hydra is turned face up, put five +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Interlopers in Sultai territory usually end up as crocodile chow or baboon bait.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, two +1/+1 counters on another target creature, and three +1/+1 counters on a third target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bonds of family cross the boundaries of race.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Regenerate Kin-Tree Warden. Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The amber of the tree and the blood of my veins are the same."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outlast {1}{G} ({1}{G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has reach. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Meandering Towershell attacks, exile it. Return it to the battlefield under your control tapped and attacking at the beginning of the declare attackers step on your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The remains of ancient sky tyrants now feed the war-torn land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) Whenever Pine Walker or another creature you control is turned face up, untap that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R} to your mana pool. Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Rattleclaw Mystic is turned face up, add {G}{U}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so. Ferocious — That creature gains indestructible until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Morph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His arrows whistle like a serpent's hiss.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Ferocious — The creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn before it fights if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am in my element: the element of surprise." —Mogai, Sultai scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top eight cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard. Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may put two creature cards onto the battlefield instead of one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Temur call the flickering lights the Path of Whispers, believing that they lead the way to ancestral knowledge.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See your enemies from a thousand sides. Then you will find a thousand ways to kill them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can have the body, necromancer. I just want the skin."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph—Reveal a green card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Temur Charger is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a face-down creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A band of Temur hunters, fleeing the Mardu, dug a hideout beneath such a creature as it slept. The horde found them and attacked. For three days the Temur held them at bay, and all the while the great beast slumbered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One quiet word sets off the stampede.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the last dragon fell, its spirit escaped as a roar into the wind." —Temur tale

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Abomination of Gudul deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Morph {2}{B}{G}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Abzan Ascendancy enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Exile target creature with power 3 or greater. • You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. • Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Morph {2}{W}{B}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These roads are desolate and changeable. Follow me, or die in the wastes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Anafenza, the Foremost attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on another target tapped creature you control. If a creature card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rarely at rest on the Amber Throne, Anafenza always leads the Abzan Houses to battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Ankle Shanker attacks, creatures you control gain first strike and deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stature of the fighter matters less than the depth of the cut.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Armament Corps enters the battlefield, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Abzan avoid extended supply lines by incorporating weapons stores into their battle formations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Avalanche Tusker attacks, target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold the high ground, then bring it to your enemy." —Surrak, khan of the Temur

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bear's Companion enters the battlefield, put a 4/4 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Sultai came hunting for a bear hide. Now I have a belt of naga skin, and my friend has a full belly."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice another creature: Butcher of the Horde gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Warrior creatures you control get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the swift, the strong, the blade's sharp shriek! Fear nothing, and strike!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Warrior creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the shield unbroken. If we fall today, we will die well, and our trees will bear our names in honor."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crackling Doom deals 2 damage to each opponent. Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do not fear the lightning. Fear the one it obeys.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crocodiles' putrid jaws swallow everything but the screams.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. If damage is prevented this way, Deflecting Palm deals that much damage to that source's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose up to one creature. Destroy the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Abzan turn to this spell only as a last resort, for its inevitable result is what they most dread: to be alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Efreet Weaponmaster enters the battlefield or is turned face up, another target creature you control gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Morph {2}{U}{R}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures you control. They gain flying and double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many Jeskai styles: Riverwalk imitates flowing water, Dragonfist the ancient hellkites, and Flying Crane the wild aven of the high peaks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings produce a high-pitched, barely audible whirring sound in flight. Only Jeskai masters are quiet enough to hear one coming.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Morph {1}{G}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Icefeather Aven is turned face up, you may return another target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it during each other player's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Abzan soldiers march to war confident that their Houses march with them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Put target creature on top of its owner's library. • Jeskai Charm deals 4 damage to target opponent. • Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return a creature card at random from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains flying, trample, and haste. Exile that card at the beginning of your next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put an X/X black and green Spirit Warrior creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the greatest toughness among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The passing years add new rings to the tree's trunk, bolstering the spirits that dwell within.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mantis riders know their mounts owe them no allegiance. Even a mantis ridden for years would consume a rider who loses focus for only a moment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control attacks, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Sacrifice Mardu Ascendancy: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Mardu Charm deals 4 damage to target creature. • Put two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield. They gain first strike until end of turn. • Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mardu Roughrider attacks, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most ferocious saddlebrutes lead the assault, ramming through massed pikes and stout barricades as if they were paper and silk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. Master the Way deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Way has no beginning and no end. It is simply the path." —Narset, khan of the Jeskai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Mindswipe deals X damage to that spell's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The past and the unwritten are frozen. To understand their meaning requires heat." —Arel the Whisperer

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, hexproof Whenever Narset, Enlightened Master attacks, exile the top four cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast noncreature cards exiled with Narset this turn without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ponyback Brigade enters the battlefield or is turned face up, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield. Morph {2}{R}{W}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{G}: Rakshasa Deathdealer gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {B}{G}: Regenerate Rakshasa Deathdealer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death fills me and makes me strong. You, it will reduce to nothing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from your graveyard, put that many +1/+1 counters on Rakshasa Vizier.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakshasa offer deals that sound advantageous to those who forget who they are dealing with.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will wash you from my hooves!" —Mardu taunt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one petal claims beauty for the lotus."

property.value: Trample, hexproof Morph {3}{G}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sagu Jungle's thick undergrowth conceals even the largest predators—if they wish to remain hidden.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Savage Knuckleblade gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. {2}{U}: Return Savage Knuckleblade to its owner's hand. {R}: Savage Knuckleblade gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Face-down creatures you control get +0/+1. Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakshasa trade in secrets, amassing wealth from their careful revelation.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Siege Rhino enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mere approach of an Abzan war beast is enough to send enemies fleeing in panic.

property.value: Trample Morph {2}{G}{U}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sure-footed, strong-willed, and ill-tempered—and so is the ram.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1: Until your next turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain lifelink. −2: Put a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying onto the battlefield. −6: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Destroy target monocolored creature. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strike," the fumes hiss. "Raise an empire with your ambition."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sultai Soothsayer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The naga of the Sultai Brood made deals with dark forces to keep their power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Surrak Dragonclaw can't be countered. Creature spells you control can't be countered. Other creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Both his rank and his scars were earned in single combat against a cave bear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Creatures with power 3 or less can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Meat sustains the body. The spirit requires different sustenance." —Arel the Whisperer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I came seeking a challenge. All I found was you." —Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent exiles the top X cards of his or her library. You may cast any number of nonland cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gold buys death. Death earns gold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Warden of the Eye enters the battlefield, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wardens guard the sacred documents of Tarkir's history, though they are forbidden to read the words.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both — • Tap target creature. • Winterflame deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mountains scream with the dragons' throats." —Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

property.value: Stone to endure, roots to remember.

property.value: Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Supplicants offer flesh and silver, flowers and blood. The altar takes what it will, eyes gleaming with unspoken promises.

property.value: All at once Sarkhan's mind fell silent.

property.value: Morph {5} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It strode through the clash of dragons, the fall of Ugin, and the rise of the khans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped. When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most powerful dreams visit those who shelter in a dragon's skull." —Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When asked how many paths reach enlightenment, the monk kicked a heap of sand. "Count," he smiled, "and then find more grains."

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the weak imprison themselves behind walls. We live free under the wind, and our freedom makes us strong." —Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dense jungle surrenders to a lush and lavish expanse. At its center uncoil the spires of Qarsi Palace.
